content: पिच्छिल {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [पिच्छ्-बा° इल] {@--1@} Slimy, lubricious, slippery, smeary; तरुणं सर्षपशाकं नवौदनं पिच्छिलानि च दधीनि Cand. <ls>M. 1.</ls> {@--2@} Having a tail. --लः --ला, --लं {@--1@} The scum of boiled rice (भक्तमंड). {@--2@} Sauce mixed with rice-gruel. {@--3@} Curds with cream on the surface. {@--4@} Broth, soup. {@--5@} Moist split pulse.
